medium: Watermarks, beet stains on handmade paper, letterpress; morocco cover with nickel clasps
title: Grievous Injuries
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on end of closure on  on last page, in pencil: [Cynthia Thompson]
description: images of snowflake-like watermark repeating on every other page--some with pinkish or yellowish spots around center area; scattered lines of text; black leather cover with front and back of cover extending down to form a flap, with a large woven knot of leather at end; silver organic-shaped clasp with leather strap
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
